about_the_game:
The Yakuza: Like a Dragon Karaoke Set adds a variety of classic and new karaoke songs to the jukebox at Survive Bar.

Note: Set does not add songs to the karaoke minigame.

New Karaoke Hits adds full Japanese and short English versions of the following songs:



  • Hell Stew (Ichiban)
  • The Future I Dreamed Of (Ichiban)
  • Spring Breeze (Saeko)
  • Machine Gun Kiss (Adachi)
  • Hell Stew (Zhao)

Classic Kiryu adds the following classic Kiryu karaoke songs (full versions):



  • Today is a Diamond (Yakuza 6: The Song of Life)
  • Hands (Yakuza 6)
  • TONIGHT -restart from this night-
  • Judgement (Yakuza 0)
  • Machine Gun Kiss (Yakuza 4)
  • Bakamitai (Yakuza 5)

Classic Majima adds the following classic Majima karaoke songs (full versions):



  • 24 Hour Cinderella (Yakuza 0)
  • Pride From Despair (Yakuza Kiwami 2)
  • As Long as You're Happy (Yakuza Kiwami 2)
  • Samurai Ondo (Ryu Ga Gotoku Ishin!)
  • Majima Construction Theme (Yakuza Kiwami 2)
  • GET TO THE TOP! (Yakuza: Dead Souls)

Karaoke Classics adds the following classic karaoke songs (full versions):



  • Shine X3 (Yuki)
  • Ring (Yuki)
  • Rain Drops (Hana)
  • Asura Komachi (Ishin / "Hana")
  • Kokyo ni Nishiki wo Kazarubeshi (Ishin/ "Saejima")
  • Bakamitai (Saejima)

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Blood, Intense Violence,  Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, and Use of Alcohol.
